pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; shoes plus socks.
pesticide.product_use: COMMERCIAL, GREENHOUSE, INDUSTRIAL, INSTITUTIONAL, NURSERY, ORNAMENTAL, RESIDENTIAL

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if swallowed. Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause allergic reaction in some individuals.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by the poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment. You may also call the following telephone numbers for emergency medical treatment. 24 HOUR EMERGENCY PHONE 1-800-424-9300 PRODUCT USE INFORMATION 1-800-356-4647

Application_Info.max_product_per_acre_per_season: 32 fluid oz per acre per year
Application_Info.application_Method: full coverage spray to the foliage
